languages.text: {n}От слов провидицы на вас накатывает волна воспоминаний о горьких, унизительных моментах {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}вашего величайшего позора{/d}. К языку подкатывает что-то кислое, в голове мутится от мерзкого ощущения собственного ничтожества.{/n}

{n}The seer's words bring back a wave of memories of the bitter, humiliating moments of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}your greatest shame{/d}. Something sour rushes to your tongue, and your head is clouded with a sickening sense of your own worthlessness.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}От слов провидицы на вас накатывает волна воспоминаний о горьких, унизительных моментах {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}вашего величайшего позора{/d}. К языку подкатывает что-то кислое, в голове мутится от мерзкого ощущения собственного ничтожества.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The seer's words bring back a wave of memories of the bitter, humiliating moments of your greatest shame. Something sour rushes to your tongue, and your head is clouded with a sickening sense of your own worthlessness.{/n}

{n}The seer's words bring back a wave of memories of the bitter, humiliating moments of your greatest shame. Something sour rushes to your tongue, and your head is clouded with a sickening sense of your own worthlessness.{/n}

{n}The seer's words bring back a wave of memories of the bitter, humiliating moments of your greatest shame. Something sour rushes to your tongue, and your head is clouded with a sickening sense of your own worthlessness.{/n}

{n}The seer's words bring back a wave of memories of the bitter, humiliating moments of your greatest shame. Something sour rushes to your tongue, and your head is clouded with a sickening sense of your own worthlessness.{/n}

languages.text: {n}眼前这位先知的话，让你想起了无数痛苦的回忆与羞辱的时刻，那些都是你最难以忍受的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}奇耻大辱{/d}。某种酸涩的味道涌上你的舌头，你的胃里感觉恶心不已，感觉自己毫无价值。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The seer's words bring back a wave of memories of the bitter, humiliating moments of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}your greatest shame{/d}. Something sour rushes to your tongue, and your head is clouded with a sickening sense of your own worthlessness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前这位先知的话，让你想起了无数痛苦的回忆与羞辱的时刻，那些都是你最难以忍受的奇耻大辱。某种酸涩的味道涌上你的舌头，你的胃里感觉恶心不已，感觉自己毫无价值。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las palabras de la vidente te traen recuerdos de los momentos amargos y humillantes de {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}tu mayor vergüenza{/d}. Notas un sabor agrio en la boca y tu mente se nubla con el enfermizo sentido de tu propia inutilidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The seer's words bring back a wave of memories of the bitter, humiliating moments of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}your greatest shame{/d}. Something sour rushes to your tongue, and your head is clouded with a sickening sense of your own worthlessness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las palabras de la vidente te traen recuerdos de los momentos amargos y humillantes de tu mayor vergüenza. Notas un sabor agrio en la boca y tu mente se nubla con el enfermizo sentido de tu propia inutilidad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}予見者の言葉は、あなたの{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}最も苦々しく屈辱的{/d}な瞬間の記憶を呼び覚ました。舌に酸っぱいものが込み上げてきて、己の無価値さを感じさせられた忌々しい記憶で頭がいっぱいになる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The seer's words bring back a wave of memories of the bitter, humiliating moments of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}your greatest shame{/d}. Something sour rushes to your tongue, and your head is clouded with a sickening sense of your own worthlessness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}予見者の言葉は、あなたの最も苦々しく屈辱的な瞬間の記憶を呼び覚ました。舌に酸っぱいものが込み上げてきて、己の無価値さを感じさせられた忌々しい記憶で頭がいっぱいになる。{/n}
{n}予見者の言葉は、あなたの{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}最も苦々しく屈辱的{/d}な瞬間の記憶を呼び覚ました。舌に酸っぱいものが込み上げてきて、己の無価値さを感じさせられた忌々しい記憶で頭がいっぱいになる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les paroles de la prophétesse font remonter en vous les souvenirs de {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}votre plus grande humiliation{/d}. Votre bouche s'emplit soudain d'un goût amer tandis qu'un profond sentiment d'inutilité embrouille votre esprit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The seer's words bring back a wave of memories of the bitter, humiliating moments of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}your greatest shame{/d}. Something sour rushes to your tongue, and your head is clouded with a sickening sense of your own worthlessness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les paroles de la prophétesse font remonter en vous les souvenirs de votre plus grande humiliation. Votre bouche s'emplit soudain d'un goût amer tandis qu'un profond sentiment d'inutilité embrouille votre esprit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Worte der Seherin bringen eine Welle von Erinnerungen an die bitteren, erniedrigenden Augenblicke {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}deiner größten Schande{/d} zurück Etwas Saures legt sich auf deine Zunge, und dein Kopf wird von einem Übelkeit erregenden Gefühl der eigenen Wertlosigkeit getrübt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The seer's words bring back a wave of memories of the bitter, humiliating moments of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}your greatest shame{/d}. Something sour rushes to your tongue, and your head is clouded with a sickening sense of your own worthlessness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Worte der Seherin bringen eine Welle von Erinnerungen an die bitteren, erniedrigenden Augenblicke deiner größten Schande wieder. Etwas Saures legt sich auf deine Zunge, und dein Kopf wird von einem Übelkeit erregenden Gefühl der eigenen Wertlosigkeit getrübt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Medyumun sözleri, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}en büyük utancının{/d} ızdırap dolu, aşağılayıcı anlarına dair anıları dalga dalga su üstüne çıkarıyor. Diline ekşi bir tat hücum ediyor, kafansa kendi değersizliğinin mide bulandırıcı hissiyatıyla bulanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The seer's words bring back a wave of memories of the bitter, humiliating moments of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}your greatest shame{/d}. Something sour rushes to your tongue, and your head is clouded with a sickening sense of your own worthlessness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Medyumun sözleri, en büyük utancının ızdırap dolu, aşağılayıcı anlarına dair anıları dalga dalga su üstüne çıkarıyor. Diline ekşi bir tat hücum ediyor, kafansa kendi değersizliğinin mide bulandırıcı hissiyatıyla bulanıyor.{/n}
